Capability Description: Receive and log project requests from government or municipalities
Process Description: Receive requests via email or meetings
Sub-Process Description: Log request details into Client Dynamics

Capability Description: Record and categorize requests in Client Dynamics; create Need Assessment record
Process Description: Record request details and categorize project
Sub-Process Description: Create and categorize Need Assessment record in Client Dynamics

Capability Description: Collect and build sector and beneficiary profiles; ingest data in BI
Process Description: Collect data; generate reports and save in Client Dynamics
Sub-Process Description: Build sector and beneficiary profiles and export reports
API (Assumption): BI Export API; Client Dynamics Import API

Capability Description: Analyze gaps between current state and best practices
Process Description: Generate gap analysis report; identify solution paths
Sub-Process Description: Export gap analysis report and store in Client Dynamics
API (Assumption): BI Export API; Client Dynamics Import API

Capability Description: Define and set baseline KPIs to measure project performance
Process Description: Identify baseline KPIs and set goals
Sub-Process Description: Sync KPIs and goals into Client Dynamics

Capability: Different Financial Instrument Mapping & Market Data Integration
Capability Description: Suggest different funding products and integrate market data. Rank them.
Process Description: Map funding instruments; feed market data from Bloomberg
Sub-Process Description: Integrate current interest rates and fees data
API (Assumption): Bloomberg Market API; Client Dynamics Update API

Process Description: Risk Analyst drafts risk profile using repository data (political, economic, operational). and update Client Dynamics
Sub-Process Description: Prepare and store risk profile in Client Dynamics

Capability Description: Check project sustainability against EBRD policies
Process Description: Evaluate sustainability compliance via Monarch integration
Sub-Process Description: Update compliance status in Client Dynamics
API (Assumption): Monarch Sync API; Client Dynamics Update API

Capability Description: Compile and submit project documents for OpsCom approval
Process Description: Prepare Concept Note and submit for review
Sub-Process Description: Compile Concept Note and submit to Operations Committee
API (Assumption): Document API; Client Dynamics Import API
